
# lensyn-ui

> A collection of UI components for lensyn.

## 组件技术栈
> 基于vue 2.0 + vuex + axios + webpack + gulp 1.13

## 安装方法

```
npm i lensyn-ui -S

main.js

import * as LensynUI from 'lensyn-ui'

or

import LensynUI from 'lensyn-ui'

Vue.use(LensynUI)

page.vue

<ls-button :objProps="objProps" @click="clickFunc"></ls-button>

```
